paras.para: These are the properties that can be used for the class of edm:ProvidedCHO. This means that they are the attributes of the original cultural heritage object (CHO) itself, not the digital representation of it. E.g. attributes of the Mona Lisa, not the digitised image of the painting. Note that the greyed out properties will not be used in the first implementation so any values provided for them will not be used.
